mapper.select:
select group_id,group_name,super_id,type,create_time,lmt from tbl_#{wid}_group
and POSITION(#{keyword} IN group_name)
mapper.update: update tbl_#{wid}_group set group_name=#{group_name} where group_id=#{group_id}
mapper.select: SELECT g.group_id,g.group_name FROM tbl_#{wid}_group g right JOIN tbl_#{wid}_group_person p ON p.group_id = g.group_id
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_#{wid}_group_device where group_id=#{group_id} and device_id=#{device_id}
delete from tbl_#{wid}_group_person where group_id=#{group_id} and person_id=#{person_id}
